_sText:
Nothing fancy this time guys, just attempted to ease the CTs work and make rebelling more difficult.

The CT have straight view to the T spawn through a glass wall, preventing to neutralize any threats.
The T can be asked to drop their weapons to the bin on checkout before the CT opens the door for the T.

The CT has various spots to camp and a teleport from spawn to the "wall" so there can be someone waiting for the T to arrive.

Everything is surrounded by a double-fence which over you cannot jump and the door raises very slowly so the T have to stay friendly towards the CT because the only way out is in a body bag.

When the T manages to get out, you will find the basic two minigames inside, shot for shot and gun toss.

Enjoy the map, and I hope there won't be so much rebelling this time,
Omena,


The map can be found here!
66.150.155.213:27015
